title: Waiting on Darius rework..
body: Everything seems to be boring, hopefully Darius gets its priority bumped up. Voice your support here. Let them know.

replies.body:
Yeah he needs one to stay on the same trademark quality as CertainlyT's other creations.

Having a balanced champ in his library is just pure awkward, rework Darius pls!!

Or better yet, just fire this guy already. Much appreciated.

I honestly think CertainlyT is one of the best champion designers.

It's just that his designs don't fit with the game. What I love about his champions is that they always cause a stir in the meta. Unlike the boring champion releases such as Quinn, Aatrox, and Vel'Koz (although Kalista was a little boring.)

IMO Yasuo was the best last release.

As a Darius main for well over a year, they just need to bring his power back at the cost of his low mobility. Unfortunately the dunk lord does less damage than a Riven while being slow and immobile as %%%%.
Last I saw they were just tweaking. They had made his passive stack to 10 instead of 5 and his ult could perma-reset again. This was months ago though.
